snippet.title: Hammer of Virtue Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
PC game coming to STEAM 2022
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1840820/Hammer_of_Virtue/
Fully destructible environments. Emergent game-play with interactive environments.

Deliberate combat. Read the enemy and act accordingly.
Large Bestiary and over 40 levels.
Skill based combat. No character progression and no loot.
